### Government Tender Announcement: MILCOT Vehicle Repair

#### Title
* English: MILCOT Vehicle Repair
* French: OCIR - MILCOT de réparation de véhicules

#### Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: W0100-22J003/B
* Publication Date: 2022-09-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-13T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 0
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Notice Type
* English: Request for Proposal
* French: Demande de propositions

#### Procurement Method
* English: Competitive - Open bidding
* French: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

#### Selection Criteria
* English: Lowest Price
* French: Prix le plus bas

#### Notice Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the repair of MILCOT vehicles at Canadian Forces Base Halifax.

The contract is to provide diagnostics, repair, and rebuild services for the Medium Support Vehicle System (MSVS) on an as-and-when-required basis. This RFSO is for a period of two years, with two one-year options.

The lowest aggregate evaluated price from responsive offers will be recommended for issuing a standing offer. Suppliers must provide pricing on all items.

#### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-13T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Contact Information
* Tara Sheppard, Supply Specialist, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Phone: (709) 640-6581
* Email: [Tara.Sheppard@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:Tara.Sheppard@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Fax: (902) 496-5016

#### Debriefing and Evaluation
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.

#### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Pan
